game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Find the missing family heirloom, a precious diamond necklace.
game.description: Lady Whimsy's favorite necklace has gone missing and she needs your help to find it. The necklace was last seen in the manor house.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a boost to your reputation

tasks.objective: Search the manor house for any signs of the necklace.
tasks.description: Look high and low in the manor house to see if you can find any clues about the missing necklace.
Speak with the butler, chef, and maid to see if they have seen anything suspicious.
Search the garden for any signs of a break-in or a hidden path.
